This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS in a promise microtask after a failing request is issued, before the transaction abort event is fired 
PASS in a promise microtask after the abort event is fired for a transaction aborted due to an unhandled request failure 
PASS in a promise microtask after the abort event is fired for a transaction aborted due to an abort() call 
PASS in a promise microtask after the transaction requests are performed 
PASS in a promise microtask after the complete event is fired for a committed transaction 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
